channel.title: XBox 360, save songs from media center to hard drive?
channel.description:
I cant rip them from the disc because i have them burned on there as .mp3s and i dont know any format that it can rip.. so i have only the media center to access my songs on my comp, but how can i get them onto my hard drive?
I can also get them from my pc with zune, but once again, i cannot save them and play them during games.

item.title: XBox 360, save songs from media center to hard drive?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“thefalloffuckingtroy., post:6, topic:247305”][quote author=Frell link=topic=326290.msg2557436#msg2557436 date=1227990979]

wma format.

didnt work

and i found out how to access songs on my memory stick so yea im fine.
[/quote]
dude, its wma format. The xbox 360 will only play wma formats, trust me, i’ve tried. just get a converter, its not that hard.[/quote]
Plays my mp3s, but when i tried wma nothing came up, but that may be because of the disc.

Read full topic

[/quote]
didnt work

and i found out how to access songs on my memory stick so yea im fine.[/quote]
dude, its wma format. The xbox 360 will only play wma formats, trust me, i’ve tried. just get a converter, its not that hard.
